item.title: What is 4G and Why Do You Want It?
item.description: You’re constantly bombarded with ads for 3G phones and wireless aircards, and now 4G is emerging. But what does this new technology mean and why should you care? 2G, 3G, 4Gâ€”these “Gs” represent different generations of wireless broadband. This technology evolves so rapidly that various generations often coexist in the same region. This is intentional. If you’re in an area with weak 3G coverage, your device automatically connects to slower 2.
